text: SG Fifty Shades : Dakota Johnson and Jamie Dornan star Does this footage reveal the truth of their working relationship? B - roll from Fifty Shades Darker - quick, candid shots from the set of the movie - show them interacting when the cameras stop rolling. And by the looks of it - as you can see for yourself below - they really do get on like firm friends. In one supermarket - set scene, Johnson even has to try and control her laughter as Dornan fools around in front of her. SG Dornan makes Johnson laugh on set SG The pair get on when the cameras stop rolling The pair are also seen goofing around under an umbrella between takes on another scene - seemingly putting rumours that they despise one - another to rest.
